txt.en: 'With the wolf gone, the road to Dwaling is now clear. This is good news because many from Dwaling usually come down for the market. They bring down their glassware and trade it for our produce.\n\n'Albin Northcotton up at the Northcotton Farm will want to know that we're ready down here and that the road is clear.'
'Everything is all set with Nibs? And the road to Oatbarton is safe, as well, you say? You have been busy!'
The road has been cleared and the wolf defeated.
Albin Northcotton is at the Northcotton Farm.\n\nAlbin Northcotton will be pleased to hear that Nibs is ready and the road is clear.
